name: Aqua Pura
description:
This game was originally created for #SeaJam inspired by #TeamSeas, you try to collect as many trash as you can with your boat to make MrBeast happy and to prevent ocean pollution.

This Game Features:
  • Fully Functional menu mechanics (Main, Settings, and Pause Menu).
  • Smooth movement mechanics.
  • Difficulty curve.
  • Music & SFX.
  • Fun GamePlay.
  • Supported for 5 different platforms! (for PC and Phones).
  • 4 different Difficulty options.
Go Support TeamSeas:

TeamSeas is a massive cleanup project to prevent Ocean pollution and remove 30 million pounds of trash from our water, if you want to protect your environment, each dollar you donate will cause one pound of trash to be removed from not only the oceans, but Beaches and Rivers too.
